explanation: The bug was that the second character of the strings (s1[1] and s2[1]) was being checked without ensuring that the string length was adequate. If the input string length is less than 2, it will raise an IndexError. I fixed it by checking the length of the strings before accessing s1[1] and s2[1]. Specifically, I added conditions to check if the length is greater than 1 before comparing the second character.
